product_name: SmartWool NTS 195 Lightweight Crew Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Perfect as a next-to-skin top on its own or under a fleece, the women's SmartWool NTS 195 Lightweight Crew Top breathes, wicks moisture and insulates naturally thanks to merino wool. Soft merino wool is naturally warm, breathable and water resistant. Offers UPF 35 sun protection, great for sunny days on the snow. Sculpted side panels eliminate side seams to reduce chafing. Contoured sleeve cuffs and droptail hem increase coverage. The women's SmartWool NTS 195 Lightweight CrewTop does not itch and will not shrink; machine wash and dry. Closeout.
short_description: Perfect as a next-to-skin top on its own or under a fleece, the women's SmartWool NTS 195 Lightweight Crew Top breathes, wicks moisture and insulates naturally thanks to merino wool.
